SEARCH
Package Prescription.Model

Class Prescription

java.lang.Object
Prescription.Model.Prescription
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
public class Prescription extends Object implements IEntity
The Prescription class represents a medical prescription in the system. It includes details about the prescription such as the doctor, patient, medication, dosage, status, and the associated appointment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String id, String doctorId, String patientId, String medicationName, String dosage, String status, String appointmentId)
      Constructor for creating a Prescription with all fields.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the prescription
      doctorId - ID of the prescribing doctor
      patientId - ID of the patient
      medicationName - Name of the prescribed medication
      dosage - Dosage of the medication
      status - Status of the prescription
      appointmentId - ID of the associated appointment

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String doctorId, String patientId, String medicationName, String dosage, String status, String appointmentId)
      Constructor for creating a Prescription without an ID. Useful for creating new prescriptions before assigning an ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - ID of the prescribing doctor
      patientId - ID of the patient
      medicationName - Name of the prescribed medication
      dosage - Dosage of the medication
      status - Status of the prescription
      appointmentId - ID of the associated appointment
